test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_aggregate
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: MAX
            values:
              - 10
              - 50
              - 30
              - 20

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_aggregate
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      definitions:
        VALUE_A: 100
        VALUE_B: 150
      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: MAX
            values:
              - $VALUE_A
              - $VALUE_B
              - 120

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_aggregate
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: MIN
            values:
              - 50
              - 10
              - 30
              - 20

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_aggregate
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      definitions:
        VALUE_A: 100
        VALUE_B: 150
      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: MIN
            values:
              - $VALUE_A
              - $VALUE_B
              - 120

test_cases.description: MAX/MIN with single value returns that value
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_aggregate
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: max_result
            type: number
          - name: min_result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: max_result
            operation: MAX
            values:
              - 42
          - output: min_result
            operation: MIN
            values:
              - 42
